title: Yes AHQ!
body:
They did it, they won, and they stomped! They proved that LMS is a possible threat to the other top 4 regions!

P.S. Partypanda I hope you were watching

replies.body:
I don't even mind TSM lost to AHQ they played so great.

But it is embarrassing that they lost to Fnatic. People will be like oh Fnatic is so good but they don't look good at other then that one game. Not getting father then them is just sad.

> [{quoted}](name=PoisonedTea,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=hpH0uJWO,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-05-08T22:03:59.699+0000)
>
> I don't even mind TSM lost to AHQ they played so great.
> 
> But it is embarrassing that they lost to Fnatic. People will be like oh Fnatic is so good but they don't look good at other then that one game. Not getting father then them is just sad.

OH sweet they beat TSM too?! I had to pack so I missed the game. How did the game go? was it a stomp or pretty even?

> [{quoted}](name=Smart Kitty,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=hpH0uJWO,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-05-08T22:21:31.207+0000)
>
> OH sweet they beat TSM too?! I had to pack so I missed the game. How did the game go? was it a stomp or pretty even?

A slow stomp. AHQ just got more advantages and won trades.

> [{quoted}](name=Smart Kitty,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=hpH0uJWO,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-05-08T22:21:31.207+0000)
>
> OH sweet they beat TSM too?! I had to pack so I missed the game. How did the game go? was it a stomp or pretty even?

Stomp. In some ways even worst then skt v tsm. I think it was 14-1 at one point?

Lol not... the FNC team composition (although may work vs a "loser team" like TSM) was bad.

First off {{champion:6}} isn't a "real ADC".  I still question the meta logic of {{champion:111}} (once he misses/burns his skills he is completely useless). {{champion:69}} Mid, although good for farming, is horrible mobility to counter {{champion:105}}.

FNC needed better CC.  {{champion:89}} is far better then the Naut pick here vs Fizz because her ulti doesn't have to be precise, can AOE hit, and will likely hit fizz even if he tries to counter.  Her ability to stun and harras Fizz is vital as well.


FNC had no counter to fizz so they lost.  Hopefully they won't make this mistake again.


We will call this one "lucky" for AHQ... more info must be had if FNC is truly falling behind or just a matter of circumstance.  Also this sheds no light on AHQ vs Asian teams long term either.

One thing that can be agreed upon:  Not looking good for TSM.

PS SMARTKITTY:  We all know your secret Element Fan that wants FNC to fail horribly :)

Oh no! TGA has arrived with his Leona Fanboying! RUN!!!!

I wouldn't call this lucky. I would call this sloppy for Fnatic. Just like I would call TSM v Fnatic sloppy. 

I'm just happy that I get to watch some good games, and Albis interrupting Urgot ult on him with a hook was godly. I was jumping and screaming when that happened!

> [{quoted}](name=Vixanys,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=hpH0uJWO,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-05-08T01:40:46.989+0000)
>
> Oh no! TGA has arrived with his Leona Fanboying! RUN!!!!
> 
> I wouldn't call this lucky. I would call this sloppy for Fnatic. Just like I would call TSM v Fnatic sloppy. 
> 
> I'm just happy that I get to watch some good games, and Albis interrupting Urgot ult on him with a hook was godly. I was jumping and screaming when that happened!

LoL after EDG vs FNC... starting to think Western teams lost again this year.


You shoulda taken me 10,000RP bet I made b4 u woulda got easy RP NP.

BTW if u get to talk to FNC... try to get him to use Ahri Mid plz :){{champion:103}}
Feb didn't really seem like he wanted to talk to fans, understandably after the EDG loss.

> [{quoted}](name=Vixanys,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=hpH0uJWO,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-08T21:15:08.132+0000)
>
> Feb didn't really seem like he wanted to talk to fans, understandably after the EDG loss.

LoL well fair enough I suppose.  In either case TSM and FNC need to stop being aggressive early game... not only do they backfire every time, but they start up the snowball against them.


They need tanky teams, or high mobility, and just focus on AFK farming/dodging ganks.  If they can make it to mid game they may have a chance.


Must say you are definitely getting a good show for your money though if you attended MSI.

> [{quoted}](name=Vixanys,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=hpH0uJWO,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-08T21:23:19.663+0000)
>
> Definitely getting my moneys worth.

LoL you know who isn't getting their monies worth?  RIOT.  [If you read other forum sections](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/BfOBnFH1-blackscreen-when-trying-to-browse-store) their in game store is down for many players (including myself)

I spent all this time farming 6300IP for the 2/1 Rune Pages only to be DENIED :(

> [{quoted}](name=TheGrandAlliance,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=hpH0uJWO,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-08T01:36:59.755+0000)
>
> Lol not... the FNC team composition (although may work vs a "loser team" like TSM) was bad.
> 
> First off {{champion:6}} isn't a "real ADC".  I still question the meta logic of {{champion:111}} (once he misses/burns his skills he is completely useless). {{champion:69}} Mid, although good for farming, is horrible mobility to counter {{champion:105}}.
> 
> FNC needed better CC.  {{champion:89}} is far better then the Naut pick here vs Fizz because her ulti doesn't have to be precise, can AOE hit, and will likely hit fizz even if he tries to counter.  Her ability to stun and harras Fizz is vital as well.
> 
> 
> FNC had no counter to fizz so they lost.  Hopefully they won't make this mistake again.
> 
> 
> We will call this one "lucky" for AHQ... more info must be had if FNC is truly falling behind or just a matter of circumstance.  Also this sheds no light on AHQ vs Asian teams long term either.
> 
> One thing that can be agreed upon:  Not looking good for TSM.
> 
> PS SMARTKITTY:  We all know your secret Element Fan that wants FNC to fail horribly :)

1. No, lol, Yellowstar is one of my favorite players ever.
2. It's not luck that AHQ won, FNC planned poorly and got punished just as much as Alliance got punished for planning poorly vs Kabum.
3. I am an elements fan, that's about the only thing you did state correctly about me, even though it's quite obvious.
4. I'm rooting for AHQ because they are the only team I was rooting for that made it to MSI. The other teams I wanted to make it all fell to 2nd, which I stated in a previous post before MSI. Also in that post I said I was conflicted on which team to root for, and one of them was guess who? FNC.
5. Underdog victories are always awesome imo.
6. You're probably just a FNC fan who's salty over the loss, not that I blame you.

Anyways, yeah I was really confused about the Urgot pick. Yellow is a good naut, and yes leona's ult does have to be precise since it only stuns in the center. Stunning two carries might be better than hitting 4 with the slow on the outer radius. I do agree that leona probably would've been a better pick though.

Edit: Forgot to say, the only team I want to fail horribly at MSI is SKT, cuz the SKT fanboys are more annoying than the TSM ones (only slightly).
They just played very well against SKT too, I'm really happy for AHQ right now.
Don't worry... SKT will take MSI undefeated most likely:  They probably won't even face a potential game loss until the Finals.
Fnatic forgot to put the snake in the top lane of course they lose.

Hell yeah! Great games happening all day!

This is intense, but one thing Riot needs to fix, these damn bathroom lines!
